import axios from'axios';import{GET_SPELLS,GET_CLASSES,GET_RACES,ITEMS_LOADING}from'./types';// Proxy to get around CORS
var proxy='https://cors-anywhere.herokuapp.com/';export var getSpells=function getSpells(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(setItemsLoading());axios.get("".concat(proxy,"https://api.open5e.com/spells/")).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:GET_SPELLS,payload:res.data});}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};};export var getClasses=function getClasses(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(setItemsLoading());axios.get("https://api.open5e.com/classes/").then(function(res){return dispatch({type:GET_CLASSES,payload:res.data});}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};};export var getRaces=function getRaces(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(setItemsLoading());axios.get("https://api.open5e.com/races/").then(function(res){return dispatch({type:GET_RACES,payload:res.data});}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};};export var setItemsLoading=function setItemsLoading(){return{type:ITEMS_LOADING};};
